engrams.name: Absorbent Substrate
engrams.description: This sticky compound excels at absorbing other chemicals.

engrams.name: Cementing Paste
engrams.description: This thick, waterproof paste could be used as mortar, or to thicken another substance.

engrams.name: Gunpowder
engrams.description: An (sic) powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

engrams.name: Sparkpowder
engrams.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Bug Repellant
engrams.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs. Just don't attack them, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

engrams.name: Lesser Antidote
engrams.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

engrams.name: Narcotic
engrams.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

engrams.name: Stimulant
engrams.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

engrams.name: Bug Repellant
engrams.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs. Just don't attack them, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

engrams.name: Lesser Antidote
engrams.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

engrams.name: Narcotic
engrams.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

engrams.name: Stimulant
engrams.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

engrams.name: Cementing Paste
engrams.description: This thick, waterproof paste could be used as mortar, or to thicken another substance.

engrams.name: Gunpowder
engrams.description: A powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

engrams.name: Sparkpowder
engrams.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Mortar and Pestle
engrams.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

engrams.name: Refining Forge
engrams.description: Requires wood, thatch, or sparkpowder to activate. Put unrefined resources in this to refine them.

engrams.name: Smithy
engrams.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

engrams.name: Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Reinforced Trapdoor
engrams.description: This small reinforced door can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Reinforced Window
engrams.description: Reinforced window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Reinforced Wooden Door
engrams.description: A reinforced wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Roof
engrams.description: An inclined stone roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Stone Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Stone Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable brick-and-mortar ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Stone Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Stone Doorframe
engrams.description: A stone wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Stone Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Stone Fireplace
engrams.description: A nice, relaxing fireplace. Keeps a large area very warm and provides light.

engrams.name: Stone Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from brick-and-mortar.

engrams.name: Stone Hatchframe
engrams.description: This brick-and-mortar ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Stone Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Stone Railing
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Stone Staircase
engrams.description: A stone spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Stone Wall
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Stone Windowframe
engrams.description: A brick-and-mortar wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Roof
engrams.description: An inclined Thatch roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Wall Left
engrams.description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Thatch Wall Right
engrams.description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

engrams.name: Thatch Door
engrams.description: Enough sticks bundled together works as a simple door. Can be locked for security, but not very strong.

engrams.name: Thatch Doorframe
engrams.description: This thatch wall has an entrance in it, but requires more wood to stay stable.

engrams.name: Thatch Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is a wooden frame with some smooth bundles of sticks that act as a floor.

engrams.name: Thatch Roof
engrams.description: A thatched roof to protect you from the elements. Not stable enough to build on.

engrams.name: Thatch Wall
engrams.description: A simple wall made of bundled sticks, and stabilized by a wooden frame. Fairly fragile, but better than nothing.

engrams.name: Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large wooden gate that can be used with a gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out. Cannot be destroyed by any dinosaur.

engrams.name: Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large wood and stone gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Rope Ladder
engrams.description: A simple rope ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Sloped Wood Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy Wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Wood Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy Wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Wooden Roof
engrams.description: An inclined wooden roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Standing Torch
engrams.description: A torch on a small piece of wood that lights and warms the immediate area.

engrams.name: Wooden Cage
engrams.description: A portable cage in which to imprison victims.

engrams.name: Wooden Catwalk
engrams.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from sturdy wood.

engrams.name: Wooden Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable wooden ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Wooden Door
engrams.description: A stable wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Wooden Doorframe
engrams.description: A wooden wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Wooden Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This very cheap, narrow foundation is used to build fences around an area.

engrams.name: Wooden Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is made from sturdy wood.

engrams.name: Wooden Hatchframe
engrams.description: A wooden ceiling with a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Wooden Ladder
engrams.description: A simple wooden ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Wooden Pillar
engrams.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Wooden Railing
engrams.description: A sturdy wooden railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Wooden Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined wooden floor for travelling up or down. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Wooden Spike Wall
engrams.description: These incredibly sharp wooden stakes are dangerous to any that touch them. Larger creatures take more damage.

engrams.name: Wooden Staircase
engrams.description: A wooden spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Wooden Trapdoor
engrams.description: This small wooden door can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Wooden Wall
engrams.description: A sturdy wooden wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity.

engrams.name: Wooden Window
engrams.description: Wooden beams on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Wooden Windowframe
engrams.description: A wooden wall with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Wooden Billboard
engrams.description: A large wooden billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Wooden Sign
engrams.description: A simple wooden sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Wooden Wall Sign
engrams.description: A simple wooden wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

engrams.name: Bookshelf
engrams.description: A large bookshelf to store Blueprints, Notes, and other small trinkets in.

engrams.name: Feeding Trough
engrams.description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry!

engrams.name: Large Storage Box
engrams.description: A large box to store goods in.

engrams.name: Storage Box
engrams.description: A small box to store goods in.

engrams.name: Fabricator
engrams.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain high-end machined items.

engrams.name: Ballista Turret
engrams.description: Survivors can mount this and fire devastating ballista arrows, useful for bringing down large dinos and structures!

engrams.name: Behemoth Gate
engrams.description: A large metal-plated concrete gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

engrams.name: Behemoth Gateway
engrams.description: A large metal-plated concrete gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

engrams.name: Catapult Turret
engrams.description: Mount this to throw destructive Boulders at your enemies, particularly effective against Structures.

engrams.name: Giant Metal Hatchframe
engrams.description: This giant metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Giant Metal Trapdoor
engrams.description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Catwalk
engrams.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from metal plates.

engrams.name: Metal Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable metal-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large metal gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Door
engrams.description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Metal Doorframe
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Metal Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Metal Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

engrams.name: Metal Hatchframe
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Metal Ladder
engrams.description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Metal Pillar
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under. Can also act as stilts for building on inclines.

engrams.name: Metal Railing
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Metal Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Metal Spike Wall
engrams.description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them. Large creatures take more damage.

engrams.name: Metal Staircase
engrams.description: A metal spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Metal Trapdoor
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Metal Tree Platform
engrams.description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

engrams.name: Metal Wall
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Metal Window
engrams.description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Metal Windowframe
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Primitive Cannon
engrams.description: A powerful, heavy weapon of war, capable of demolishing heavily reinforced structures.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Roof
engrams.description: An inclined metal roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Wall Torch
engrams.description: A torch on a metal connector that lights and warms the immediate area. Must be placed on a wall.

engrams.name: Metal Billboard
engrams.description: A large metal billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Metal Sign
engrams.description: A small metal sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Metal Wall Sign
engrams.description: A simple metal wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

engrams.name: Behemoth Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Behemoth Stone Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A massive brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used for penning up huge dinosaurs.

engrams.name: Giant Reinforced Trapdoor
engrams.description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Giant Stone Hatchframe
engrams.description: This Giant Stone ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Wooden Tree Platform
engrams.description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

resources.name: Cooked Prime Meat or Prime Meat Jerky
